scripts.dev: npx kill-port 5001 && npx kill-port 3004 && npx kill-port 3005 && npx kill-port 3006 && concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.dev:backend: cd server && cross-env DISABLE_TIME_CHECK=true MONGODB_MOCK=true node server.js
scripts.dev:backend:prod: cd server && cross-env DISABLE_TIME_CHECK=true MONGODB_MOCK=false node server.js
scripts.start:win: npx kill-port 5006 && cross-env DISABLE_TIME_CHECK=true concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "cd server && node server.js"
scripts.server: cd server && cross-env DISABLE_TIME_CHECK=true MONGODB_MOCK=true node server.js
scripts.server:prod: cd server && cross-env DISABLE_TIME_CHECK=false MONGODB_MOCK=false node server.js
